name: Shell Game (Roobicorn)
description:
This is my first published game, originally made for GameMaker Community Jam 37: under the theme "It knows something you don't."

This is a very early version of Shell Game, which is still in development.
Here are some of the features I hope to add:

  • 'Endless' mode & High-score board - try to beat the dealer in continuous rounds with ever-mounting difficulty.
  • 'Dodgy dealer' - The dealer will use sleight of hand to try to trick you! watch for the traps.
  • Alternate art for shells,
  • More variations on 'shuffling' animations.

Thanks for playing, please leave any feedback in the comments or @Roobicorn on twitter.
